snippet.title: Game Boy Longplay [314] Alien 3 (US)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Tsunao

Explore-y....something...game by Bits Studio.

Follow soldier lady Ellen Ripley as she crashes on some planet and fight some critters in a prison compound or some sh'.

Gameplay involves making your way through the compound, finding equipment, solving puzzles, and fighting the aliens.  Main objective is to destroy the eggs as they continue to spawn more alien critters.

This longplay destroys all the alien critters and the queen bitch while trying to find many items.  Most of the time is spent waiting for the aliens to respawn. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
